name: Ten Seconds (JudgeClark)
description:
You've fitted an illegal steam engine to your car.
To not draw too much unwanted attention, you've laid an accumulator bet on finishing second .. ten times (in a row)

Z = accelerate
R = Restart

Reilly Jam 4 Entry Rules 1. 10 seconds must be a core mechanic of the game (this can come in many forms) 2. The game must take no longer than 5 minutes to play 3. Implementation and creativity of the brief will be rated over design
